column3: Context
column4: Key
column6: SourceEnglish

column3: Title text on screen
column4: EPISODI TRES
column6: EPISODE THREE

column4: LA MINA
column6: THE MINE

column4: Prem X per començar
column6: Press X to Begin

column4: 3 setmanes després
column6: 3 weeks later

column3: Hard Ass, Kick Ass, and Sick Ass are running back to the Mine in the heavy rain.
column4: Afanya't, Feblase!
column6: Hurry up, Sick Ass!

column4: Està corrent TANT COM POT!
column6: She's doing HER BEST!

column4: *TUS*
column6: *COUGH*

column3: The screen fades up from black to reveal Sturdy listening to the Foal (her now-born daughter).
column4: Camarada Mare, canviarà mai aquest temps horrorós?
column6: Comrade Mother, will this crappy weather ever end?

column4: Tinc fred.
column6: I'm cold.

column4: Tinc gana.
column6: I'm hungry.

column4: Estic xopa.
column6: I'm damp.

column4: I el pitjor de tot...
column6: And worst of all...

column4: M'AVORREIXO.
column6: I'M BORED.

column4: Ai, el meu Pollí, em sap greu que no puguis tenir la infantesa que jo vaig tenir, trotant pels camps.
column6: My Foal, I'm sorry you can't have the childhood I had toiling in the fields.

column4: Però els Déus no trigaran a destruir les maleïdes Màquines i els Humans tornaran amb nosaltres.
column6: But soon the Gods will destroy the evil Machines and the Humans will return to us.

column4: Aleshores podràs tenir una vida plena de treball honest i veritable.
column6: Then you will grow up to have a life full of true and honest work.

column4: ¿És veritat que treballar...és taaaaan guai?
column6: Is work...really thaaaaaaat great?

column4: Com pots preguntar això?!
column6: How can you ask that?!

column4: Els Déus van obsequiar els nostres Ancestres amb la capacitat de treballar.
column6: The Gods gave our Ancestors the power to work.

column4: Vivien per treballar. I morien treballant.
column6: They lived at work. And they died at work.

column4: Portes el Treball a l'Ànima.
column6: Work is in your Soul.

column4: Però Camarada Mare...
column6: But Comrade Mother...

column4: I si jo no vull treballar...?
column6: What if I don't want to work...?

column4: ¿I si vull córrer amunt i avall i explorar el món?
column6: What if I want to jump around and explore?

column4: I si només vull...jugar?
column6: What if I just want... to play?

column3: Big Ass enters frame with an announcement.
column4: {vpunch=100,0.75}Porto una notícia immensa, Camarada Tossudase! En Fortalase, en Ferase i la Feblase han tornat!
column6: {vpunch=100,0.75}I have a massive announcement, Comrade Sturdy! Hard, Kick, and Sick are back!

column4: Iupiii!
column6: Wahoo!

column3: Sturdy, The Foal, and Big Ass all go to meet the others.
column4: Tant de bo hagin trobat prou menjar per a tothom...
column6: If we're lucky, the scavengers will have found enough food tonight for everyone...

column3: The Herd convenes at the mouth of the cave to greet the Scavengers (Hard, Sick, and Kick).
column4: Ja som aquí.
column6: We're back.

column4: *TUS*
column6: *COUGH*

column4: Bona feina, Camarades—
column6: Well done, Comrades—

column4: Explica'm les teves aventures, Oncle Ferase!
column6: Tell me about your adventures, Uncle Kick!

column4: Ara no, criatura. Deixa que descarreguin el carro i s'eixuguin.
column6: Not now, child. Let them set down the cart and dry off.

column4: Això és tot el que heu trobat?
column6: Is that all the food you managed to find?

column4: El riu s'ha desbordat.
column6: The river was flooded.

column4: Ens hauríem d'oblidar d'ells.
column6: We should forget about them.

column4: No hem pogut arribar als punts on solem trobar menjar.
column6: We couldn’t forage in the usual spots.

column4: No és suficient, però farem que duri.
column6: It's not enough food, but we’ll make it last.

column4: Llestase, fes les racions.
column6: Smart Ass, divide the rations.

column4: Iguals, no?
column6: Equally this time, right?

column4: Què passa, que un Ase no pot fer broma amb la panxa buida?
column6: Oh come on, an Ass can’t joke on an empty stomach?

column4: Heu vist algun signe dels Humans?
column6: Were there any noticeable signs of Humans?

column4: Tots els Humans han desaparegut.
column6: The Humans are all gone.

column4: Podem ser els nostres propis Amos.
column6: We can be our own Masters.

column4: ELS NOSTRES PROPIS AMOS?!
column6: OUR OWN MASTERS?!

column4: Sense Humans estem tots—
column6: Without Humans we'll all—

column4: En Ferase, la Feblase i jo ens estem posant en risc i sacrificant-nos pel Ramat.
column6: Kick, Sick, and I are risking our health and making sacrifices for the Herd.

column4: Tu què fas per salvar el Ramat?
column6: What are you doing to help to save the Herd?

column4: *TUS*
column6: *COUGH*

column4: TU ets l'expert en supervivència, no?!
column6: YOU'RE the expert on saving are you?!

column4: *TUS TUS*
column6: *COUGH COUGH*

column4: Però no vas poder salvar la Perase i no vas poder salvar ni un sol Humà—
column6: You couldn't save Lazy Ass and you couldn't save a single Human—

column4: *TUS TUS*—
column6: *COUGH COUGH*—

column4: FEBLASE! @#$%&!
column6: SICK ASS! @#$%&!

column4: Si no anem a buscar els Humans ara mateix, acabarem tots com la Feblase.
column6: If we don't leave and find the Humans now, we'll all end up like Sick Ass.

column4: Hem de sortir d'aquí!
column6: We need to get out of here!

column3: These appear on screen as a cacophony of brays.
column4: I anar on?
column6: Go where?

column3: These appear on screen as a cacophony of brays.
column4: Com de lluny?
column6: How far?

column3: These appear on screen as a cacophony of brays. (Spoken by Thirsty)
column4: Vaiga, jo què sé.
column6: Ah heck, I dunno.

column3: These appear on screen as a cacophony of brays.
column4: Tinc gana.
column6: I'm hungry.

column3: These appear on screen as a cacophony of brays.
column4: Però cari, aquí estem calents i a aixopluc.
column6: Golly, but it's warm and dry in here!

column3: These appear on screen as a cacophony of brays.
column4: @#$%&! No podem ABANDONAR la Feblase!
column6: @#$%&! We can't leave Sick BEHIND!

column3: These appear on screen as a cacophony of brays.
column4: Que no soc la Gran Estratega?!
column6: Aren't I the Ace Strategist?!

column3: Sturdy Ass shouts for everyone to calm down.
column4: CAMARADES. No perdem temps ni energia barallant-nos.
column6: COMRADES. Let's not waste our time and energy fighting amongst ourselves.

column4: Hem d'estar units.
column6: We have to stick together.

column4: Llestase, fes les racions i que mengi tothom.
column6: Smart Ass, let's divide the rations and get everyone fed.

column4: {$NewName}, ves a jugar amb les teves roques.
column6: {$NewName}, go play with your rocks.

column4: Puc? Iupiii!
column6: Really? Wahoo!

column3: Fade out from this scene and into Mine1F.
column4: Sí, mentre no t'acostis a les Màquines malvades, inanimades, usurpadores, infanticides.
column6: Yes, just stay away from the evil, soulless, job-taking, child-killing Machines.

column4: Coixase
column6: Slow Ass

column4: Eixutase
column6: Thirsty Ass

column4: Grandase
column6: Big Ass

column4: Bellase
column6: Nice Ass

column4: Ferase
column6: Kick Ass

column4: Llestase
column6: Smart Ass

column3: Surdy says this to prevent The Foal from going outside into the rain.
column4: EI! Es pot saber on vas?
column6: HEY! Where do you think you are going?

column3: Said after playing Rocks.
column4: Jugar a Roques és tan tan TAN guai!
column6: I love love LOVE Rocks!

column3:
Variation 1. 
If the Foal hasn't talked to Nice and Sad.
column4: Potser la Tia Bellase em vol veure jugar!
column6: Maybe Aunty Nice wants to watch me play!

column3:
Variation 2.
If the Foal has talked to Nice and Sad.
column4: Potser l'Oncle Eixutase em vol veure jugar!
column6: Maybe Uncle Thirsty wants to watch me play!

column3: Interactable object (wall), the scoreboard.
column4: El meu rècord d'avui a Roques és {$Number}.
column6: My high score for Rocks today is {$Number}.

column3: The Foal says this to herself when finding one of the Rocks that allow her to play a variation of Rocks.
column4: Que guai. Aquesta roca és diferent! Me la guardo!
column6: Cool. This rock looks different! I'm gonna keep it!

column3: The Foal says this to herself when finding one of the Rocks that allow her to play a variation of Rocks.
column4: Guau, quina roca més dura! Me la guardo.
column6: Wow, what a hard rock! I'm gonna keep it.

column3: The Foal says this to herself when finding one of the Rocks that allow her to play a variation of Rocks.
column4: Guau, quina roca més clàssica! Potser és la meva preferida!
column6: Wow, what a classic rock! This one might be my favourite!

column3:
The Foal says this to herself when finding one of the Rocks that allow her to play a variation of Rocks.

This object is also the wheel for the minecart, needed to break the wall to the next area.
column4: Aquesta roca és ben estranya...
column6: This is a weird looking rock...

column3: The Foal says this to herself if she interacts with the wall and she doesn't have the wheel,
column4: Està segellat.
column6: It's all boarded up.

column3: The Foal says this to herself if she interacts with the mine cart and she doesn't have the wheel,
column4: Li falta una d'aquestes peces rodones...
column6: It's missing one of those round things...

column3: The Foal says this to herself when she successfully brings the wheel object to the cart. It can now be pushed into the wall.
column4: Que guai! Encaixa perfecte!
column6: Cool! It fits perfectly!

column3: Public conversation with Sad (and Nice).
column4: *ploriqueja*
column6: *whimper*

column4: Vols veure com jugo a Roques, Oncle Tristase?
column6: Do you want to watch me play Rocks, Uncle Sad?

column4: Ho sento...No tinc ànims per jugar.
column6: Sorry... I’m not really in the mood to play.

column4: Per què no?
column6: Why not?

column3: Jump to either line 20 or 23.
column4: *suspira* Perquè hi ha dies que el teu Oncle Tristase no sap ni per què viu...
column6: *sigh* Because some days your Uncle Sad Ass just doesn't know why he's alive...

column3: Dialogue option 1.1.
column4: Digues a l'Oncle Tristase per què creus que viviu.
column6: Tell Uncle Sad Ass why you think you're alive.

column4: Crec que vivim per gaudir del present i fer el que ens fa feliços.
column6: I think we're alive to live in the present and do what brings us joy.

column3: Jump to line 25.
column4: Si el que fem no ens fa feliços, potser hauríem de fer una altra cosa!
column6: If what we're doing doesn't bring us joy, maybe we should do something different!

column3: Dialogue option 1.2.
column4: Digues a l'Oncle Tristase per què diu la Camarada Mare que viviu.
column6: Tell Uncle Sad Ass why Comrade Mother says you're alive.

column3: Jump to line 25.
column4: La Camarada Mare diu que vivim per honrar el llegat dels nostres Ancestres amb el Treball dur.
column6: Comrade Mother says we're alive to honour the legacy of our Ancestors through hard Work.

column3: Nice Ass enters the frame.
column4: ¿La {$NewName} t'està donant bons consells, Oncle Tristase?
column6: Is {$NewName} giving you some good advice, Uncle Sad?

column4: Sí... És ben igual a la seva germana Perase.
column6: Yes... She's just like her sister Lazy used to be.

column4: Plena de saviesa.
column6: Full of wisdom.

column4: La Perase sempre deia, "L'avorriment és..."
column6: Lazy always said, "Boredom is..."

column4: "és..." *ploriqueja*
column6: "is..." *whimper*

column4: Ho sento, jove Camarada, donem una mica d'espai al teu Oncle.
column6: Sorry little Comrade, let's give your Uncle some space.

column3:
End of conversation.
Player can move around again.
column4: No és fàcil per a ell tornar a ser dins la Mina.
column6: It's not easy for him being back inside the Mine.

column3: Repeater for Sad Ass.
column4: *suspira*
column6: *sigh*

column3: Repeater 1 for Nice Ass.
column4: No et preocupis, no té res a veure amb tu.
column6: Don't worry, it's not your fault.

column4: Només és que li recordes molt a la teva germana.
column6: You just remind him so much of your sister.

column3: Repeater 2 for Nice Ass.
column4: Deixem-li una mica d'espai.
column6: Just give him some space.

column3: Private conversation with Sad and Nice, while Foal is inside the tunnels.
column4: Hi ha algú que xiuxiueja...
column6: Someone's whispering...

column3: The camera moves over to Nice Ass.
column4: Camarada—
column6: Comrade—

column4: ¿Diràs als altres que jo vaig provocar l'Incendi, oi...?
column6: You're going to tell the others I set the Fire, aren't you...

column4: Ni de conya, cari. Et vaig fer una promesa i no la penso trencar!
column6: Not a chance. I made a gosh darn promise and I intend on keeping it!

column4: Això vas dir...però no tot el que dius és veritat.
column6: You say that... but not everything you say is true.

column4: Aquell dia a la Comuna...Em vaig creure que les coses millorarien.
column6: That day in the Outhouse... I really thought that things would get better.

column4: Però no ho han fet.
column6: But they haven't.

column4: Tothom es pot equivocar!
column6: We all make mistakes!

column3: Jump to either line 45 or 46.
column4: En Fortalase no va poder salvar els Humans.
column6: Hard Ass couldn't save the Humans.

column3:
Branch 2.1.
If the stable was set on fire in Ep2.
Jump to line 47.
column4: Jo no vaig ser prou ràpida per salvar l'Estable.
column6: I wasn't fast enough to save the Stable.

column3:
Branch 2.2.
If the stable was saved in Ep2.
Jump to line 47.
column4: Jo amb prou feines vaig poder salvar l'Estable.
column6: I only barely saved the Stable.

column4: I l'Honradase...pobra Honradase.
column6: And Trusty Ass... poor Trusty Ass.

column4: *ploriqueja*
column6: *whimper*

column3: its Job capital?
column4: Potser no hi ha estàtues d'or ni balls ni recuperem les Feines.
column6: Maybe there won't be golden statues or dancing or our old Jobs.

column3:
End of conversation.
Player can move around again.
column4: Però cari, pensa que ens tenim els uns als altres!
column6: But golly, at least we have each other!

column3: Public conversation with Big and Thirsty.
column4: *uf*—m'apareix que això és una idea de locos!
column6: *oof*—Just sayin' it's a crazy idea!

column4: Oh! Hola, petita Camarada.
column6: Oh! Hello little Comrade.

column3: Jump to dialogue options, lines 55, 59, or 62.
column4: Estem movent aquesta pedrota per si l'aigua torna a arribar fins aquí.
column6: We're just moving this boulder in case the flood starts to come any closer.

column3: Dialogue option 3.1.
column4: Vols veure com jugo a Roques?
column6: Do you want to watch me play Rocks?

column4: Vols veure com jugo a Roques?
column6: Do you want to watch me play Rocks?

column4: Ho sento, petita Camarada, estem carregats de tasques.
column6: Sorry little Comrade, we are weighed down with tasks.

column3:
End of conversation.
Player can move around again.
column4: Enga xiqueta! Ham de tornar a la faena!
column6: Now skidaddle! We gotta git rockin'!

column3: Dialogue option 3.2.
column4: Les pedres no aturen l'aigua, no?
column6: Boulders can't stop water, can they?

column4: Les pedres no aturen l'aigua, no?
column6: Boulders can't stop water, can they?

column4: Tu coneixes bé les teves roques, petita Camarada, però aquesta és d'una altra lliga.
column6: You know your rocks little Comrade, but this one's out of your league.

column3:
End of conversation.
Player can move around again.
column4: Enga xiqueta! Ham de tornar a la faena!
column6: Now skidaddle! We gotta git rockin'!

column3: Dialogue option 3.3.
column4: No hi ha una manera millor de moure una pedra?
column6: Isn't there a better way to move a boulder?

column4: No hi ha una manera millor de moure una pedra?
column6: Isn't there a better way to move a boulder?

column4: El múscul és la millor manera.
column6: Muscle is the greatest method there is.

column4: I per què no feu un sistema que aixequi un costat quan poseu prou pes a l'altre costat?
column6: But why don't you make a system that would lift one side up when you put enough weight on the other side?

column4: Podria ser divertit!
column6: You could make it fun too!

column4: Buay! Mos estàs dient que no sabem lo que fem, xica Camarada?
column6: Heck, you tryin' to tell us that we don't know what we're ding dang doin' lil' Comrade?

column3:
End of conversation.
Player can move around again.
column4: Au! Acamina que no et banyes!
column6: Now git goin'!

column3: Repeater for Thirsty Ass.
column4: Au ves!
column6: Go on, git!

column3: Private conversation with Big and Thirsty, while Foal is inside the tunnels.
column4: Què són aquests panteixos?
column6: What's that heavy breathing?

column3: The camera moves over to Thirsty Ass.
column4: *uf!*—Tu que volies aigua, aquí la tens, Eixutase!
column6: *oof!*—You wanted water and you got it, Thirsty!

column4: Això no és—*uf!*—lo que jo volia!
column6: This ain't—*oof!*—what I wanted!

column4: *uf*—Quin és l'últim cop que cap de nosaltres ha aconseguit el que volia?
column6: *oof*—When was the last time any of us got what we wanted?

column4: Si la pluja no s'atura o no tornen els Humans—*uf!*—ens morirem de fam.
column6: If the rain doesn't stop or the Humans don't come back—*oof!*—we're going to starve.

column4: Quina me'n dius! Estàs pensant en—*uf!*—anar-te'n?
column6: Don't tell me yer—*oof!*—thinking about leavin'?

column4: Camarada, vull més de la vida.
column6: Comrade, I want more in life.

column4: Que vuigues més de la vida no vol dir que haigues d'abandonar ca teva!
column6: Just because yer wantin' more in life don't mean you got to abandon yer home!

column4: Lo meu somni és muntar un raser ben especial aquí a Talldevall, on els Ases puiguen xalar amb un bon beure.
column6: I'm dreaming of setting up a darn special place right here in Fannyside where Asses can get a drink and let loose.

column4: Tindria tota mena d'aigua exquisida.
column6: It'd have all kinds of tasty water.

column4: Aigua de pluja. Aigua de riu. Aigua de bassa.
column6: Rain water. River water. Pond water.

column4: Es diria... Sant Hilasi!
column6: I’d call it... Bottoms Up!

column4: *uf!*—Sense Humans?
column6: *oof!*—No Humans?

column3:
End of conversation.
Player can move around again.
column4: No...*uf!*—Suposo que no.
column6: No... *oof!*—I guess not.

column3: Public conversation with Sick, Kick, and Hard.
column4: ¿Oncle Ferase, Oncle Fortalase, voleu veure com jugo a Roques?
column6: Uncle Kick, Uncle Hard, do you want to watch me play Rocks?

column4: Et sembla que ÉS HORA DE JUGAR?!
column6: Does this LOOK LIKE A TIME FOR GAMES?!

column4: Perdona—@#$%&!—La Tia Feblase... no es troba gaire bé.
column6: Sorry—@#$%&!—Aunty Sick is... pretty messed up right now.

column4: Què li passa?
column6: What's wrong with her?

column4: El nostre cos no està fet per aquest temps tan humit.
column6: Our bodies break down in rainy weather.

column4: És per això que et falta una orella?
column6: Is that what happened to your ear?

column4: No.
column6: No.

column4: El dia de la Manifestació, vaig haver de salvar els Humans de l'Incendi.
column6: On the day of the Protest, I was in charge of saving the Humans from the Fire.

column3: Jump to dialogue options. Line 94 or 96.
column4: Em vaig quedar atrapat en un dels edificis.
column6: I became trapped inside of a burning house.

column3: Dialogue option 1.1.
column4: I què va passar?
column6: What happened next?

column3: Jump to line 99, 101, or 103.
column4: I què va passar?
column6: What happened next?

column3: Dialogue option 1.2.
column4: Ah, sí. Ja he sentit aquesta història.
column6: Oh right. I've heard this story before.

column3: Jump to line 99, 101, or 103.
column4: Ah, sí. Ja he sentit aquesta història.
column6: Oh right. I've heard this story before.

column4: El foc em va fondre la pell i se'm va perforar el timpà.
column6: The flames melted my skin and punctured my ear drum.

column4: El foc em va fondre la pell i se'm va perforar el timpà.
column6: The flames melted my skin and punctured my ear drum.

column6: My ear was crushed, became gangrenous, and fell off four days later.

column4: Ja n'hi ha prou. Ves-te'n.
column6: That's enough. Run along.

column3: Repeater line for Hard Ass.
column4: T'he dit que te'n vagis.
column6: I said leave us.

column3: Repeater line for Sick Ass.
column4: *TUS*
column6: *COUGH*

column3: Private conversation between Hard and Kick, while Foal is inside the tunnels.
column4: Sona com si algú estigués patint...
column6: It sounds like someone's in pain...

column3: The camera moves over to Sick Ass.
column4: *TUS TUS*
column6: *COUGH COUGH*

column4: Feblase! Camarada! VINGA, GERMANA!
column6: Sick! Comrade! COME ON GIRL!

column4: Ni se t'acudeixi PENSAR a anar allà on NO PUGUI TROBAR-TE!
column6: Don't even THINK about going where I CAN'T FIND YOU!

column4: Descansi, Camarada.
column6: At ease, Comrade.

column4: DESCANSI? @#$%&!!!!
Sortir sota la pluja cada dia va ser la TEVA IDEA DE MERDA!
column6: Staying out in the rain every day was YOUR STUPID idea!

column4: I per a què, EH?
column6: And for what, HUH?

column4: PER A QUÈ?!
column6: FOR WHAT?!

End of conversation.

column4: Per al nostre futur.
column6: For our future.

column3: Conversation with Slow Ass.
column4: Vols veure com jugo a Roques, Oncle Coixase?
column6: Will you watch me play Rocks, Uncle Slow?

column4: M'encantaria, p-p-però... no c-c-crec que p-p-pugui jugar al t-t-teu joc.
column6: I'd love to b-but... I don’t think I can p-play that game of yours.

column4: Les roques van massa ràpid p-p-per a mi.
column6: The rocks go too fast for me.

column4: Segur q-que la meva vella amiga Honradase ho hauria fet molt bé.
column6: I b-bet my old friend Trusty would have b-been great at it...

column3:
End of conversation.
Player can move around again.
column4: Ella ho feia t-t-tot bé.
column6: She could do anything.

column3: Repeater line for Slow Ass.
column4: L'Honradase era d'aquells líders que et fan c-c-creure en t-t-tu mateix.
column6: Trusty was the kind of leader who made you b-believe in yourself.

column3: Public conversation with Sturdy and Smart.
column4: Ei, petita Camarada, en Rudase està deixant perdre la seva ració un cop més. Te l'hauries de menjar tu.
column6: Hey little Comrade, Bad Ass is letting his ration go to waste again. You should take it.

column4: De veritat?
column6: Really?

column4: Pels Déus! Llestase, ja saps que la {$NewName} encara no pot digerir aquesta mena de menjar.
column6: By the Gods! Smart Ass, you know {$NewName} can't digest that kind of food yet.

column4: Doncs m'ho menjo jo.
column6: Then I'll eat it.

column4: Ni pensar-ho. És per a en Rudase.
column6: No you won't. It's Bad Ass's.

column4: Això és malbaratar!
column6: What a waste!

column4: En Rudase no hi és mai, i totes les seves racions s'acaben florint!
column6: He's never around and his rations just go mouldy!

column3:
End of conversation.
Player can move around again.
column4: Ves-te'n, criatura. He de parlar d'una cosa important amb la Tia Llestase.
column6: Run along child. I need to speak with Aunty Smart about something important.

column3: Repeater line for Sturdy Ass.
column4: Ves a jugar amb les teves roques.
column6: Go play with your rocks.

column3: Private conversation between Sturdy and Smart, while Foal is inside the tunnels.
column4: ¿S'estan barallant la Camarada Mare i la Tia Llestase?
column6: Are Comrade Mother and Aunty Smart arguing?

column3: The camera moves over to Smart Ass.
column4: Si els Humans no tornen a Talldevall, mai recuperarem la nostra Feina...
column6: If the Humans don't return to Fannyside, we'll never get our Jobs back...

column4: Ho entenc, Camarada.
column6: I understand, Comrade.

column4: Però en Fortalase diu que fa setmanes que no veu cap Humà.
column6: But Hard Ass says he hasn't seen any Humans for weeks.

column4: Doncs hauríem de sortir a buscar-los!
column6: Then we should go and find them!

column4: Camarada, no és segur allà fora.
column6: Comrade, it's not safe outside.

column4: No ens podem arriscar a pedre la nostra Gran Estratega en una crescuda del riu o en una patinada.
column6: We can't go losing our Ace Strategist in a flood or a mudslide.

column4: Tens tota la raó, no podeu...
column6: You're damn right you can't...

column3:
End of conversation.
Player can move around again.
column4: Els Déus no ens abandonaran.
column6: The Gods won't leave us behind.

455 Esmasses,
Butte Mines #2

column3: Butte's Log (Journal Entry)
column4:
27 de juny
Són dies difícils per a la Mina. Avui he hagut d'acomiadar més treballadors i se'ns acaben els fons. Madame Paner m'ha fet una altra oferta per comprar-me els rucs, però soc incapaç de desfer-me'n. Els rucs són l'únic que em queda!

Tothom està obsessionat per l'Energia Verda avui en dia. Ningú vol sentir parlar de carbó.

28 de juny
Encara que tingués més diners, no podria contractar ningú. Tot el jovent se n'ha anat a Tecnolona a treballar amb millors condicions a la Fàbrica de Madame Paner. S'acosta un altre hivern difícil.
column6:
June 27th
These are dire times for the mining business. I had to lay off more workers today and we're running out of money. Mme. Derriere made another offer to buy my donkeys, but I just can't bring myself to sell them. The only thing I can depend on are my donkeys!

Everybody is crazy for Green Energy these days. Nobody cares for coal anymore.

June 28th
Even if I had more money, there's no one to hire. All the youth are leaving for Mecha City to find better paid work at Mme. Derriere's Factory. It's going to be another difficult winter.

column3: Butte's Log (Journal Entry)
column4:
3 de juliol
Gairebé no podem fer front a les despeses. Avui també ens han tombat la subvenció estatal. Ni tan sols ens han dit per què! Si els fem nosa, no sé per què el Govern no actua humanitàriament i ens exigeix que tanquem.

13 de juliol
La Jennifer diu que hauríem de transformar la Mina en una atracció turística. Quan la nova autopista estigui acabada, la gent podria venir de la ciutat a passar-hi el dia.
Potser no és tan mala idea? Però és desoladora.
column6:
July 3rd
We can barely afford new equipment. Our government grant was rejected today too. They're not even offering feedback! If they don't want us around, I don't know why the government doesn't just do the humane thing and order us to close down.

July 13th
Jenny joked that we should turn the Mine into a tourist attraction. Once the new highway is finished more people from the city could come and make a day of it.

Maybe she has a point? But it would break my heart.

column3: Butte's Log (Journal Entry)
column4:
15 de juliol

FACTURA
EBZ75 Màquina Tuneladora — 52.000 €

He Bei Zhong Xuan Construction Machinery Co., Ltd.

column6:
July 15th

INVOICE
EBZ75 Tunnel Boring Machine — $56,000 USD

He Bei Zhong Xuan Construction Machinery Co., Ltd.
Room.2809, Building2, East international Plaza, No.98
The Yellow river Rd, Hi-Tech Zone
Shijiazhuang, Hebei, China

column3: Butte's Log (Journal Entry)
column4:
17 d'agost
El Banc de la Ciutat m'ha aprovat el préstec i he adquirit immediatament maquinària nova de trinca. Això comença a millorar!

Eixamplaré els túnels i hi posaré raïls. Tot seguit em vendré els rucs i compraré vagonetes.

Aquesta nit encetaré l'ampolla de vi que em guardava per un dia com avui!

Per fi podré recuperar la Gemma. Potser per fi tornarà a respectar-me i tornarà a casa.
column6:
August 17th
The City Bank has approved my loan and I immediately put some money down on brand new equipment. Things are looking up!

I'm going to widen the tunnels and put tracks down. Then I'll sell my donkeys and buy mine carts.

Tonight, I'm going to celebrate with that bottle of wine I've been saving for an occasion just like this!

I'm finally ready to win Sandy back. Maybe now she will respect me, and come home again.

column3: Butte's Log (Journal Entry)
column4:
17 d'agost
El Banc de la Ciutat m'ha aprovat el préstec i he adquirit immediatament maquinària nova de trinca. Això comença a millorar!

Eixamplaré els túnels i hi posaré raïls. Tot seguit em vendré els rucs i compraré vagonetes.

Aquesta nit encetaré l'ampolla de vi que em guardava per un dia com avui!

Per fi podré recuperar la Gemma. Potser ara em mereixo el seu respecte i decideix tornar a casa.
column6:
August 17th
The City Bank has approved my loan and I immediately put some money down on brand new equipment. Things are looking up!

I'm going to widen the tunnels and put tracks down. Then I'll sell my donkeys and buy mine carts.

Tonight, I'm going to celebrate with that bottle of wine I've been saving for an occasion just like this!

I'm finally ready to win Sandy back. Maybe now she will respect me, and come home again.

column3: Fannyside Times (Newspaper Entry)
column4: DIARI DE TALLDEVALL
column6: FANNYSIDE TIMES

column3: Fannyside Times (Newspaper Entry)
column4: Un terrible accident amb una Màquina Tuneladora enfonsa el Senyor Roca
column6: Boring Machine Blunder Begets Backlash for Big Boss Butte

column3: Fannyside Times (Newspaper Entry)
column4: El poble encara es recupera de la tragèdia de dimarts passat a la Mina Roca. Després de múltiples intents fallits de rescat, el catastròfic esfondrament provocat per una Màquina Tuneladora va provocar la mort de Jofre Roca (21 anys), un treballador local de la mina, nen prodigi de la robòtica, i únic fill de l'Amo de la Mina, Enric Roca. Tres miners van poder ser evacuats amb helicòpter i traslladats a l'Hospital General Edèn, ferits de molta gravetat. Un ruc va morir, atrapat a l'esfondrament. El cos del jove Roca no s'ha pogut localitzar.
column6: The town is still reeling from the tragedy at Butte Mines on Thursday. After several failed rescue operations, a catastrophic cave-in caused by a Boring Machine claimed the life of Cole Butte (21), a local mine worker, robotics wunderkind, and the darling son of the Mine Boss, Hugh G. Butte. Three miners were air-lifted to the nearby Eden General Hospital with life threatening injuries. One donkey died and remains stuck in the cave. Cole's body was never found.

column3: Fannyside Times (Newspaper Entry)
column4: Una entrevista amb un extreballador revela que l'empresa era conscient dels riscos estructurals d'excavar en aquell tram de la mina. La cerca del benefici va fer que l'empresa ignorés els avisos i engegués la nova maquinària sense adoptar les precaucions adequades. Però el que ara ens hem de preguntar és: ¿el Senyor Roca ha tocat fons?\n\nContinua a la pàgina 14.
column6: An interview with a former worker reveals the company knew about the compounding danger of digging in that section of the mine, but the pursuits of profits pushed the company to ignore early warnings and take shortcuts with their new machinery. But one has to ask, has Boss Butte finally hit rock bottom?\n\nThis story is continued on Page 14.

column3: Fannyside Times (Newspaper Entry)
column4: "TANT DE BO EL MEU ART FACI LA GENT FELIÇ"
column6: "I HOPE MY ART MAKES PEOPLE HAPPY"

column3: Fannyside Times (Newspaper Entry)
column4: El jove artista Joanet Kulan conquereix el cor del jurat i guanya el concurs regional de dibuix per a menors de 12 anys de Viladeculs. La seva obra estarà exposada al Museu de Tecnolona fins a finals de mes. La seva Àvia n'està molt orgullosa.
column6: Child artist Joey Kulan charms the pants off the judges and wins the Bumpkin regional drawing competition for youth 12 and under. His work will be on display at the Mecha City Gallery until the end of the month. His Grandmother is so proud.

column3: The Foal says this after closing the newpaper.
column4: M'avorreeeeeeeeeeeixo!
column6: Booooorrrrrring!

column3: The floor collapses and the Foal falls through to Lazy's Grave.
column4: AH!
column6: AH!

column3: The Foal finds herself in a new area of the Mine. A mysterious voice calls out.
column4: Ei.
column6: Hi.

column4: Qui hi ha aquí?
column6: Who's there?

column4: Soc la Perase.
column6: I'm Lazy.

column4: PERASE?! He sentit a parlar tant de tu!\n
column6: LAZY?! I've heard so much about you!\n

column4: Soc la teva... espera...
column6: I’m your... wait...

column4: No ets...?
column6: Aren't you...

column4: No soc de menjar-me l'olla.
column6: Just hanging out.

column4: Fes una volta si vols. Pren-t'ho amb calma.
column6: Look around if you want. Knock yourself out.

column4: Espera!
column6: Wait up!

column3: Lazy floats away and the Foal chases after her.
column4: Soc la teva germana!
column6: I’m your sister!

column3: The Foal comes across a pile of bones.
column4: Això són...ossos?
column6: Are these... bones?

column3: Lazy floats back into frame.
column4: Ah, has trobat la roca que em va esclafar el cap.
column6: Oh you've found the rock that crushed my head.

column4: Guau. Et va fer mal?
column6: Woah. Did it hurt?

column4: Suposo. No recordo gaires coses d'abans.
column6: I guess so. Don't really remember much from before that.

column4: ¿Per què la teva Ànima no va anar al Pla Astral?
column6: Why didn't your Ass Soul go to the Astral Plane?

column4: La Camarada Mare diu que és on anem quan morim.
column6: Comrade Mother told me that's where we all go when we die.

column4: No hi havia cap Ase a prop per cantar per mi. Només el fill de l'Amo.
column6: There was no Ass around to sing for me. There was only the Boss's son.

column4: Crec que vaig intentar ascendir tota sola... però es veu que no me'n vaig sortir.
column6: I think I tried to ascend myself... but I guess that failed.

column4: Et podria cantar la Cançó de l'Ascensió ara!
column6: I could try to sing the Song of Ascension for you now!

column4: Bah, massa tard.
column6: Nah, it's too late.

column4: Però ei! La bona notícia és que aquí no hi ha feina!
column6: But hey! Good news is: there's no work here.

column4: Clar que la mala notícia és que tampoc hi ha sortida.
column6: Of course, bad news is there's also no way out.

column4: No hi ha sortida?! Jo no vull morir aquí!
column6: There's no way out?! I don't want to die alone!

column3: Lazy floats away again.
column4: Tu posa't còmode. "L'avorriment és la nova llibertat", saps què vull dir?
column6: Just get comfortable. "Boredom is Freedom", ya know?

column3: The Foal chases after her.
column4: Ei, espera! Torna!!
column6: Wha-wait! Come back!!

column3: The Foal finds a hard helmet on a rock.
column4: Ei, et queda genial.
column6: Hey, nice look.

column3:
Lazy floats by and says this before flying off again.
The Foal can now headbutt and break rocks.
column4: Saps què vull dir, si hagués portat aquest casc, potser hauria esclatat la roca en comptes del meu cap.
column6: Ya know, if I had worn that helmet, maybe the rock would've exploded instead of my skull.

column3:
The Foal breaks the boulder to the exit of Lazy's Grave.
Lazy's floats into frame.
column4: Ei! Has trobat una sortida. Que guai.
column6: Hey! You found a way out. Cool.

column4: T'aviso que no em recordaré de tu si tornes algun dia.
column6: Heads up, I won't remember you, if you come back.

column4: La meva memòria ja no és el que era.
column6: My memory doesn't store stuff like it used to.

column4: Ja ni recordo com et dius.
column6: I don't even remember your name.

column3: To dialogue options (line 35, 38, or 41)
column4: Hem passat una bona estona juntes?
column6: Did we have a good time hanging out?

column3: Dialogue 1.1.
column4: M'ha encantat conèixe't per fi, germana.
column6: It was really nice to finally meet you, sister.

column4: M'ha encantat conèixe't per fi, germana.
column6: It was really nice to finally meet you, sister.

column3: Lazy Ass floats away.
column4: Germana? Haha, segur. Pau i amor.
column6: Sister? Ha, sure. Peace out.

column3: Dialogue 1.2.
column4: Què vols dir amb "L'avorriment és la nova llibertat"?
column6: What do you mean "Boredom is Freedom"?

column4: Què vols dir amb "L'avorriment és la nova llibertat"?
column6: What do you mean " Boredom is Freedom"?

column3: Lazy Ass floats away.
column4: Jo què sé. Ho vaig veure un cop en un cartell.
column6: I dunno. I saw it on a sign once.

column3: Dialogue 1.3.
column4: No. Han estat {$Number} segons de la meva vida que no recuperaré mai.
column6: No. It was {$Number} seconds of my life I'll never get back.

column4: No. Han estat {$Number} segons de la meva vida que no recuperaré mai.
column6: No. It was {$Number} seconds of my life I'll never get back.

column3: Lazy Ass floats away.
column4: Això ha estat dur.
column6: That's cold.

column3: Repeater line.
column4: Ei, soc la Perase! Quin barret més guai.
column6: Hi, I'm Lazy! Cool hat.

column4: Gràcies, petita.
column6: Thank you little one.

column4: El meu estimat Tristase...
column6: My dear Sad Ass...

column4: Ara em torna tot.
column6: It's all coming back to me now.

column4: Però aquesta olor... em recorda a ell.
column6: But that smell... it reminds me of him.

column4: Saps, la meva memòria no va gaire bé.
column6: You see, my memory hasn't been working very well.

column4: Crec que he estat buscant això molt de temps.
column6: I think I've been looking for that for a long time.

column4: Si et dic la veritat, ja ni recordo com et dius.
column6: To be honest, I don't even remember  your name.

column3: Butte's Log (Journal Entry)
column4:
15 de maig
Estic anant a les reunions d'Alcohòlics Anònims. M'estan ajudant molt. Saps?, va molt bé estar acompanyat, que et donin consells. Crec que ho necessitava.

27 de maig
Porto una setmana sencera sobri. Puc prescindir de la cervesa, però una copa de vi un cop a la setmana no m'hauria de fer cap mal, no?

Avui m'he venut el ruc depressiu a la Granja de Talldevall. Des que la seva companya va morir a l'ensorrament no val per a res.
column6:
May 15th
I've started attending an AA group. They're helping me. It's really nice to have a lot of people behind you, giving you advice, you know? I think I've needed this.

May 27th
A whole week sober. I think I can give up beer, but a little bit of wine once a week shouldn't hurt, right?

Today I sold my depressed donkey to Fannyside Farm. It's been useless ever since its mate died in the cave in.

column3: Butte's Log (Journal Entry)
column4:
24 de juliol
La Mina Roca està oficialment en venda. Tant de bo algú de Tecnolona s'animi a comprar-la. Jo que sempre havia pensat que en Jofre m'agafaria el relleu...

D'alguna manera la Mina ha de sobreviure, però no és fàcil deixar anar el que t'estimes.
column6:
July 24th
Butte Mine is officially for sale. I'm praying that someone from Mecha City will step up and buy it. I always imagined that Cole would take my place, but...

This place has to survive, somehow, but it's hard to let go of what you love.

column3: This dialogue is said as the Foal looks at a picture of the Mine Asses.
column4: Que seriosos que estan tots.
column6: Everyone looks so serious.

column3: The Foal headbutts and turns the Boring Machine on.
column4: Que guai!
column6: Cool!

column3: The Boring Machine starts moving and drilling through walls.
column4: Oh oh!
column6: Uh oh!

column3: Butte's Log (Journal Entry)
column4:
9 d'agost
Totes les operacions de la Mina estan encallades.

I la sequera comença a fer estralls.

Els meus últims treballadors s'estan amotinant. Saben que no els puc pagar.

Ningú vol comprar la Mina.

Ningú m'ajuda. Estic sol.

Ja ningú necessita carbó... ¿Pot ser que algú em vulgui comprar els rucs?
column6:
August 9th
The whole mining operation is stalled.

And the drought is starting to take a toll on all of us.

The last of my workers are revolting against me. They know I can't pay them.

There are no buyers for the Mine.

Help is not coming. I'm all alone.

No one has any use for coal anymore... Maybe someone out there will buy my donkeys?

column3: The Foal spots the Elevator from across a chasm.
column4: Ei! Això sembla una drecera!
column6: Hey! That looks like a shortcut!

column3: The Foal stands in front of the Elevator and considers using it.
column4: Bé, les altres dues Màquines no m'han fet res...
column6: Well the other two Machines weren't that bad...

column6: That was fun!

column3:

The Foal can now go through the entrance to the Bad Cave at the bottom of the Mine.
column4: En fi... Aniré pel camí llarg!
column6: Oh well. I'll just take the long way!

column6: Are you going to quit?

column3:
Dialogue option 1.1.
Fade out of DonkeyBas and back into Bad Cave.
column4: Sí
column6: Yes

column3:
Dialogue option 1.2.
Player continues to play DonkeyBas.
column4: No
column6: No

column3: Dialogue option 1.1.
column4: Qui hi ha aquí? No t'amaguis!
column6: Who's there? Quit hiding!

column3: Go to line 7
column4: Qui hi ha aquí? No t'amaguis!
column6: Who's there? Quit hiding!

column3: Dialogue option 1.2.
column4: Perase? Ets tu?
column6: Lazy? Is that you?

column3: Go to line 7
column4: Perase? Ets tu?
column6: Lazy? Is that you?

column3: The camera moves to reveal the mysterious voice. It's Bad Ass.
column4: Merda. Fot el camp!
column6: Fuck. Go away!

column4: Deixa'm sol, criatura. No vull haver de discutir amb ta Mare.
column6: Leave me alone, kid. I don't want to have to deal with your Mother.

column4: Oncle Rudase?!
column6: Uncle Bad Ass?!

column4: Eres aquí?
column6: Is this where you've been?

column4: Un moment, ¿què són totes aquestes Màquines?
column6: Wait, what are all these Machines?

column4: UN MOMENT!
column6: WAIT!!

column4: T'ESTÀS CREMANT?
column6: ARE YOU ON FIRE?

column4: ...aquestes Màquines es diuen Ordinadors.
column6: ...these Machines are called Computers.

column4: D'on han sortit?
column6: Where did they come from?

column4: Els vaig treure de les runes de les cases dels Humans.
column6: I took them from the rubble of the Humans' houses.

column4: La majoria no funcionen, però n'he reparat un. Els altres em serveixen per tenir peces de recanvi.
column6: Most are broken, but I rebuilt this one. I'm using the rest for spare parts.

column4: La Camarada Mare sempre diu que les Màquines són malvades...
column6: Comrade Mother always says Machines are evil...

column4: Però jo no n'estic tan segur.
column6: But I'm not so sure.

column4: No comencis amb el discurs maquinofòbic de la Camarada Mare.
column6: Don't give me that anti-Machine Comrade Mother-bullshit.

column4: Les Màquines no són malvades si saps com utilitzar-les.
column6: Machines aren't evil if you know how to use them.

column4: Guau...
column6: Woah...

column4: ¿I què poden fer els Ordinadors... si saps com utilitzar-los?
column6: So what can Computers do, if you... know how to use them?

column4: Poden servir per moltes coses: poder, plaer, vigilància, control.
column6: They can be used for a lot of things: power, pleasure, surveillance, control.

column4: Són lògics i no es deixen endur per les emocions. Poden resoldre qualsevol problema.
column6: They're logical and they don't get emotional. They can solve anything.

column4: Però ara mateix estic jugant—així que deixa'm en pau.
column6: But right now, I'm playing games—so leave me alone.

column4: JUGAR!
column6: GAMES!

column4: M'encanta m'encanta M'ENCANTA jugar!
column6: I love love LOVE games!

column4: Podem jugar junts?
column6: Can we play together?

column4: No.
column6: No.

column4: Aquest joc és per a un sol jugador.
column6: This is a one player game.

column4: Però...
column6: But...

column4: Suposo que tothom té dret a jugar.
column6: I suppose everyone should have a chance to play.

column3: A screen wipe (transition) happens and we find ourselves playing DonkeyBas.
column4: Només procura no atropellar els burros.
column6: Just don't hit the donkeys.

column3:
This dialogue happens if the Player won DonkeyBas.
If the Player loses, pass over this and jump to line 37.
column4: Ets millor del que em pensava.
column6: You're better than expected.

column3: We are back in the Bad Caves and the Foal and Bad Ass are talking.
column4: Això és MOLT MILLOR QUE JUGAR A ROQUES!
column6: That was WAY BETTER THAN ROCKS!

column4: Les Màquines són GENIALS!
column6: Machines are FUN!

column4: De fet, aquest joc és de fa mil anys.
column6: This game is actually really old.

column4: Avui en dia n'hi ha de molt millors.
column6: There are even better ones out there now.

column4: A quins altres JOCS PODEM JUGAR?!
column6: What other GAMES CAN WE PLAY?!

column4: A cap. S'ha acabat l'hora del pati. M'he de tornar a concentrar en el meu projecte.
column6: None. Break time is over. I have to get back to my project.

column4: ¿Per què el Ramat té tanta por de les Màquines?
column6: Why is the Herd afraid of Machines?

column4: Perquè el seu intel·lecte està constrenyit per la fidelitat a ideals del passat.
column6: Because they are intellectually compromised by their commitment to past ideals.

column4: Així... ¿És per això que no estàs amb la resta del Ramat, Oncle Rudase?
column6: So... Is that why you don't spend more time with the Herd, Uncle Bad Ass?

column4: No m'agraden els Ases.
column6: I don't like Asses.

column4: Bé, jo no soc cap Ase, soc un Pollí!
column6: Well, I'm not an Ass, I'm a Foal!

column4: Per ara.
column6: For now.

column4: ¿Puc... quedar-me aquí sota amb tu?
column6: Can I... stay down here with you?

column3: End of Episode
column4: ... No m'aniria malament un Ajudant.
column6: ... I suppose I could use an Assistant.
